resources.name: CreateUser (Seller) - 201
resources.description:
- Rota não precisa de autenticação

### Campos obrigatórios (Exceto: complement)
- email: string,
- name: string,
- password: string,
- cpf: string,
- phone: string,
- birthDate: string,
- description: string,
- is_seller: boolean,
- address: {
		  cep: string,
  		state: string (2 dígitos, ex.: PR),
  		city: string,
  		street: string,
  		number: string,
			complement: string}
			
### Retorno esperado 
**Status 201 Created**

```json
{
	"userAdvertisements": [],
	"address": {
		"id": "c42644f4-ce2e-485a-a833-f56ce133a7a0",
		"cep": "41100610",
		"state": "SP",
		"city": "Sorocaba",
		"street": "da Bavaria",
		"number": "587",
		"complement": "escola"
	},
	"updated_at": "2023-05-05T02:42:04.125Z",
	"created_at": "2023-05-05T02:42:04.125Z",
	"is_active": true,
	"is_seller": true,
	"is_adm": false,
	"description": "lorem ipsum é um texto blablabla",
	"birthDate": "12/06/1991",
	"phone": "991695852",
	"cpf": "038.076.555-10",
	"email": "joao@mail.com",
	"name": "joao silva",
	"id": "ae188737-b93f-4633-924d-186783f55757"
}
```

resources.name: Motors Shop
resources.description:

[Acesse o repositório do Frontend](https://github.com/Kenzie-Cars/frontend)</br>

-	cover_img: string,
-	description: string,
-	fuel: string,
-	images: [

			image2: string
